data.name: Line Hold
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST TODAY!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1537590/LineHold/


About the Game



LineHold is a Top-Down Action Shooter mixed with Tower Defense. Your job is to make distant planets a bit safer to colonize. Use a vast arsenal of weapons and turrets to eliminate all threats. Build mazes and defensive structures to survive the waves of incoming enemies. Level up and unlock new skills and more equipment to help you live a bit longer.

Tower Defense + Base Building


Create your base filled with different turrets and buildings such as cloning unit, radar and many others. Additionally use indestructible nodes that you can use to build intricate maze for your enemies and block off strategic paths. Your planning and foresight will help you live longer.

Character Progression


Choose your speciality and adjust unlocked skills to your gameplay! You decide what your character will be better at by choosing new skills and perks. And with each level you unlock more weapons and structures.

Vast Arsenal


Fight waves of enemies swarming your base using 10 different weapons - each of them has two firing modes. Use them to create combo effects for maximum damage. Keep shooting as your second weapon is reloading in the meantime - NON STOP ACTION!

Campaign Mode and Survival Mode

Progress through more and more challenging missions in campaign or try to survive as long as possible in survival mode and compete with other players on the leaderboard.

Adapt your Strategy to your Enemies

Some are simple brutes, some will try to pull you into the horde, and some will create more enemies upon death. Know your enemies and then prioritize your targets to ensure your survival. Build defenses that are best suited to eliminate swarming enemies.

data.short_description: Top-Down Shooter meets Tower Defense. Build a maze, turrets and barricades. Survive waves of enemies and keep shooting. Level up and unlock new skills and buildings.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 2.5GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IntelÂ® HD Graphics 5000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 3.5GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or greater desktop screen resolution (Intel hd 3000 or comparable)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 13.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon x850 or comparable
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
